code: import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import React from'react';import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{decreaseItemQuantity,increaseItemQuantity,removeItemFromCart}from'../../redux/cart/cart.actions';import"./cart-product.style.scss";import arrowRight from"../../assets/arrow-right.svg";import arrowLeft from"../../assets/arrow-left.svg";var CartProduct=function CartProduct(_ref){var id=_ref.id,name=_ref.name,price=_ref.price,color=_ref.color,size=_ref.size,thumb=_ref.thumb,qty=_ref.qty;var dispatch=useDispatch();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row checkout-product",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-3 product-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"image",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(thumb,")")}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-md-3 options",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"color ".concat(color)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"size",children:size})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-md-3 quantity",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:arrowLeft,onClick:function onClick(){qty>1?dispatch(decreaseItemQuantity(id,color,size)):dispatch(removeItemFromCart(id,color,size));}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:qty}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:arrowRight,onClick:function onClick(){dispatch(increaseItemQuantity(id,color,size));}})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-3 price",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[price*qty,"$"]})})]});};export default CartProduct;
